title: Newspaper Delivery
content:
from cs1robots import *

load_world('worlds/newspaper.wld')

bot = Robot(beepers=1)
bot.set_trace('blue')
bot.set_pause(0.3)

bot.move()
# ...

.grader.py.body:
import re
from gradepad import StdoutCollector, Grader
import cs1robots

position_log = [[0, 0], [1, 0], [1, 1], [2, 1], [3, 1], [3, 2], [4, 2], [5, 2], [5, 3], [6, 3], [7, 3], [7, 4], [8, 4], [9, 4], [8, 4], [7, 4], [7, 3], [6, 3], [5, 3], [5, 2], [4, 2], [3, 2], [3, 1], [2, 1], [1, 1], [1, 0], [0, 0]]
beepers_dict = {'9,4': 1}

def grade(grader):
    test1 = grader.test('A robot exists.', 'Please make one robot. No more, no less. Try "bot = Robot()"?')
    test2 = grader.test('Robot climbed up all stairs and came back to the original position.', 'Please move the robot to climb up and down the stairs in the world exactly like in the example.')
    test3 = grader.test('Robot has dropped the beeper at the target position..', 'Please let the robot drop the beeper at the top of the stairs exactly like in the example.')
    
    cs1robots.helper.load_world('newspaper')
    cs1robots.helper.lock_world()
    collector = StdoutCollector()
    with collector:
        import main
    
    robots = cs1robots.helper.get_all_robots()
    test1.expect(len(robots) == 1)
    test2.expect(robots[0].position_log == position_log)
    test3.expect(cs1robots.helper.get_all_beepers_dict() == beepers_dict)
    
grader = Grader(locale='en')
grader.run(grade)
